description: An avatar metadata object. Holds extra information about an avatar such as its name, author(s), color, and more.
markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  author: string <OR> authors: string[],
  version: string,
  color: Color,
  background: unknown,
  autoScripts: string[],
  autoAnims: string[],
  ignoredTextures: string[],
  customizations: {
    [partPath]: {
      visible: string,
      parentType: string,
      moveTo: string,
      primaryRenderType: RenderType,
      secondaryRenderType: RenderType
    }
  }
}
```
***
An avatar metadata object. Holds extra information about an avatar such as its name, author(s), color, and more.

defaultSnippets.label: No metadata
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: This file can be completely blank, it will treat it as if you don't want any data set.

defaultSnippets.label: ​Minimum metadata, One author
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  author: string
}
```
***
Includes the absolute minimum for data.

defaultSnippets.label: ​Minimum metadata, Several authors
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  authors: string[]
}
```
***
Includes the absolute minimum for data.

defaultSnippets.label: ​​Basic metadata, One author
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  author: string,
  version: string,
  color: Color
}
```
***
Includes some basic data such as the name, author, Figura version, and theme color.

defaultSnippets.label: ​​Basic metadata, Several authors
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  authors: string[],
  version: string,
  color: Color
}
```
***
Includes some basic data such as the name, authors, Figura version, and theme color.

defaultSnippets.label: ​​Full metadata, One author
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  author: string,
  version: string,
  color: Color,
  autoScripts: string[],
  autoAnims: string[],
  ignoredTextures: string[],
  customizations: {...}
}
```
***
Includes all possible data an avatar can have.

defaultSnippets.label: ​​Full metadata, Several authors
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
```ts
{
  name: string,
  authors: string[],
  version: string,
  color: Color,
  autoScripts: string[],
  autoAnims: string[],
  ignoredTextures: string[],
  customizations: {...}
}
```
***
Includes all possible data an avatar can have.

customization.markdownDescription:
```ts
[partPath]: {
  visible: string,
  parentType: string,
  moveTo: string,
  primaryRenderType: RenderType,
  secondaryRenderType: RenderType
}
```
***
A customized part.

visible.description:
Sets if this model part is visible by default.
This is usually set by Blockbench, but can also be set here if you wish.
visible.markdownDescription:
```ts
visible: boolean
```
***
Sets if this model part is visible by default.

This is usually set by Blockbench, but can also be set here if you wish.

parentType.description:
The "parent" of this model part.
This is usually set by keywords, but can also be set here if you wish.
parentType.markdownDescription:
```ts
parentType: string
```
***
The "parent" of this model part.

This is usually set by keywords, but can also be set here if you wish.

moveTo.description: Changes the parent model part of this model part.
moveTo.markdownDescription:
```ts
moveTo: string
```
***
Changes the parent model part of this model part.

primaryRenderType.description: The render type of the base texture on this part.
primaryRenderType.markdownDescription:
```ts
primaryRenderType: RenderType
```
***
The render type of the base texture on this part.

secondaryRenderType.description: The render type of the secondary texture (usually the emissive) on this part.
secondaryRenderType.markdownDescription:
```ts
secondaryRenderType: RenderType
```
***
The render type of the secondary texture (usually the emissive) on this part.

name.description:
The name of this avatar.
If this does not exist, the folder's name is used as the avatar name.
name.markdownDescription:
```ts
name: string
```
***
The name of this avatar.  
If this does not exist, the folder's name is used as the avatar name.

author.description:
The sole author of this avatar.
If you wish to add multiple authors, see "authors" instead.
author.markdownDescription:
```ts
author: string
```
***
The sole author of this avatar.

If you wish to add multiple authors, see `authors` instead.

version.description:
The version of Figura this avatar is made for.
If this does not exist, no version checking will be done.

The version must be a valid semantic version.
version.markdownDescription:
```ts
version: string
```
***
The version of Figura this avatar is made for.  
If this does not exist, no version checking will be done.

The version must be a valid semantic version.

color.description:
The primary color of this avatar.
Controls the color of the nameplate mark and the avatar info text color.

Color can either be a special named color or a hex value. (The "#" is optional.)
color.markdownDescription:
```ts
color: Color
```
***
The primary color of this avatar.  
Controls the color of the nameplate mark and the avatar info text color.

Color can either be a special named color or a hex value. (The `#` is optional.)

authors.description:
A list of this avatar's authors.
If this avatar only has one author, you can also use "author" instead.
authors.markdownDescription:
```ts
authors: string[]
```
***
A list of this avatar's authors.

If this avatar only has one author, you can also use `author` instead.

autoScripts.description:
A list of relative paths to scripts the avatar should automatically execute.
The scripts are executed in the order given.

If empty, no scripts are automatically executed.
If this does not exist, all scripts are automatically executed in alphanumeric order.
autoScripts.markdownDescription:
```ts
autoScripts: string[]
```
***
A list of relative paths to scripts the avatar should automatically execute.  
The scripts are executed in the order given.

If empty, no scripts are automatically executed.  
If this does not exist, all scripts are automatically executed in alphanumeric order.

autoAnims.description:
A list of animations the avatar should automatically play.

If this is empty or does not exist, no animations are automatically played.
autoAnims.markdownDescription:
```ts
autoAnims: string[]
```
***
A list of animations the avatar should automatically play.

If this is empty or does not exist, no animations are automatically played.

ignoredTextures.description:
A list of textures that should not be loaded by Figura.

Mainly used for special textures such as templates or guides.
ignoredTextures.markdownDescription:
```ts
ignoredTextures: string[]
```
***
A list of textures that should not be loaded by Figura.

Mainly used for special textures such as templates or guides.

customizations.description: Contains a list of key-value pairs where the keys are paths to model parts (minus the starting "models.") and the values are the starting customizations for that part.
